paper_title: THE IMPACT OF COVID-19 ON STUDENT EXPERIENCES AND EXPECTATIONS: EVIDENCE FROM A SURVEY
paper_summary: This working paper discusses the impact of COVID-19 on students' experiences and expectations, based on evidence from a survey.
